name: larynx
description: The onboard communication system of the Rover.

scripts.lint: if-env NODE_ENV=CI && npm run lint: || npm run lint:fix
scripts.test: if-env NODE_ENV=CI && npm run test: || if-env npm_config_dev=true && npm run test:dev || if-env npm_config_debug=true && npm run test:debug || npm run test:
scripts.test:dev: if-env npm_config_debug=true && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run test:debug || cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run test:

author: RescueOnWheels
